footer.reminderText: Failure information has timeliness, but recent failure records have high reference value. It is recommended to avoid these combinations

submit.regularWebsiteDesc: Regular SMS websites with platform guarantee
submit.customWebsiteDesc: If not in the list, it means no one has submitted it yet. Please click Custom Website to submit information
submit.websiteServiceDesc: Regular SMS websites with platform guarantee. If not in the list, it means no one has submitted it yet. Please click Custom Website to submit information
submit.personalServiceDesc: Individual SMS service providers. If not in the list, it means no one has submitted it yet. Please click Custom Website to submit information
submit.scammerServiceDesc: Scammers who only take money without providing services. Submitting helps others avoid pitfalls. If the scammer's contact is Telegram, it's recommended to click Custom Website and submit the numeric ID (because usernames can be changed, but numeric IDs are fixed), e.g.: Website name: https://t.me/jiema8889999, Website URL: tg://user?id=6158602733
submit.personalAndScammerDesc: Individual SMS providers, private card sellers, and known scammers
submit.countryCodeValidation: Country code must be a two-letter ISO code (e.g., CN, US)
